column4: i'm having issues in firefox in ubuntu 8.10 with cookie sessions, especially google. tried creating a new profile and even erase all google cookies
i'm having issues in firefox in ubuntu 8.10 with cookie sessions, especially google. tried creating a new profile and even erase all google cookies
i'm having issues in firefox in ubuntu 8.10 with cookie sessions, especially google. tried creating a new profile and even erase all google cookies
my session expires after exit firefox and i have to login every time
checked google cookies and they are not set to expire
asterlash - you probably have Firefox set to erase them?
Edit -> Preferences -> Privacy tab ... can you just verify real quick one more time?
accept cookies as well as accept cookies from3rd parties is checked
asterlash - how about the setting in Private Data?
down near the bottom of that configuration panel...
can you go to its details and make sure you dont clear them out?
clean personal settings not checked and ask before erase checked
